item.title: Flow Control

item.title: Bash Variables
item.description: Variable NAME="John" echo $NAME echo "$NAME" echo "${NAME} Condition if [[ -z "$string" ]]; then echo "String is empty" elif [[ -n "$string" ]]; then echo "String is not empty" fi

item.title: How I setup the webpage
item.description: This website is my personal portfolio and blog. It uses Hugo framework, Emacs, Org-mode, Org-roam and OX-hugo for managing website. Brief overview of myself: I am Flow Assurance Team lead in ExxonMobil India. I have worked on various greenfiled and brownfiled projects as FA lead or as independent contributor. What can you expect here? This website is a location for me to discuss various topics I learned. The blog is a place for me to dump all my learning and ideas.
